sense.gloss: to joke, to jest, to kid, to josh
to make fun of, to laugh at, to play a prank
to romp, to gambol, to frolic, to frisk, to mess around, to fool around, to screw around

sdata.j: すぐ|ふざける|んだから。↑真面目↑↓まじめ↓に↑聞↑↓き↓いてよ。
sdata.e: You always start making jokes. I really want you to listen seriously.

sdata.j: 「↑自分↑↓じぶん↓は↑内向↑↓ないこう↓↑的↑↓てき↓だって↑言↑↓い↓ってますよ」「|ふざける|な！あいつが↑内向↑↓ないこう↓↑的↑↓てき↓なわけがないだろう！」「↑私↑↓わたし↓もそう↑思↑↓おも↓います」
sdata.e: He says he's an introvert. "Yeah right! There's no way that guy's an introvert!" "I was thinking the same thing."
